Reviews.Content: arrived morning day sydney 23 hour flight tired hauling bags happily stowed office directions darling harbour oh goodness crossed street darling 89 dollars night dozens restaurants aquarium water taxis imax maritime museum 5 minutes walk 5 hours sightseeing returned hotel check inthe sad little awning door invoke sense youth hostel days traveling staircase inside likes creak loudly goes forever sinks refrigerators able shop woolies woolworths food varied dramatically hand tables australia australia watch television pampered staff friendly willing assist taxis directions advice fell love darling harbour sydney couldnt afforded stay close harbour else fancy traveler bad light sleeper skip hotel adventure love walk dont mind sharing bathroom value australia

Reviews.Content: booked stay nights sydney hotel value money paid 69 dollars single shared bathroom cheap injured leg staff upgraded ensuite ground floor didnt climb stairs simple clean bed comfortable staff warm helpful breakfast adequate nice little courtyard relax close darling harbour dodgy leg walk bit road noise lovely gentleman reception unfortunately city unavoidable definitely stay
